# **Labor Day/Weekend Sale 2020**

## **Hosting Deals**

> **30% off VPS - Recurring - ([NVMe](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=32), [SSD](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=20)) - [Virtual Private Servers](https://www.spryservers.net/vps)**
> 
> *Use promo code LBD2020A (Valid thru Monday, September 8th)*
> 
> * **[SSD KVM Nano](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=208)** | 10GB SSD | 512MB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer | $4.20/mo
> * **[SSD KVM Micro](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=209)** | 20GB SSD | 1GB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer | $7/mo
> * **[NVMe KVM Nano](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=292)** | 8GB NVMe | 512MB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer @ 1Gbps | $4.20/mo
> * **[NVMe KVM Micro](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=293)** | 16GB NVMe | 1GB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer | @ 1Gbps | $7/mo

> **\*Extra Deal: 50% off Plesk Shared and Reseller Hosting - Recurring**
> 
> *Use promo code LBD2020B (Valid thru Monday, September 8th)*
